content: If an LLM error happens in the initial messages, replace the "Next Feature/fix" button with the "Start" button again. If an error happens during the LLM response to a user's reply, make it as if the user clicked the edit message next to their reply.
TypeError: setIsStarted is not a function. (In 'setIsStarted(false)', 'setIsStarted' is undefined)
If an error happens during the LLM response to a user's reply, make it as if the user clicked the edit message next to their reply.
